scripts.build: yarn install  &&  yarn run -T tsc  &&  yarn run vite build  &&  NODE_ENV=production  node build.mjs  &&  yarn run test
scripts.dev: yarn run -T concurrently -k  "NODE_ENV=development  yarn run vite build --logLevel warn --force --watch"  "node build.mjs --dev"  "sleep 2 && yarn run test:dev"  "yarn run dev:server"
scripts.__build: yarn install  &&  yarn run gulp build  &&  yarn run test
scripts.__dev: yarn install  &&  yarn run gulp dev
scripts.test:dev: sleep 1  &&  (yarn run test || true)  &&  yarn run test:watch
scripts.test:watch: yarn run -T onchange '__tests/**/*.tests.js' -f add -f change -- yarn run -T ospec '{{file}}'
